name: Text RPG
description:
Turn-based text RPG roguelite where you choose 1 out of 3 classes to conquer the dungeon and smash the enemies

gameplay

The game is a simple text-based roguelike where you have to collect gear and make the right choices to survive and defeat the final boss which is the main goal of the game besides having fun :)

key Features:

  • 40+ items
  • 3 classes
  • 6 subclasses
  • 25+ enemies
  • 13 bosses
  • 6 floors
